Poor Service from Citibank:
Citibank provided poor service to my family. In 2023, we decided to cancel our Citibank card, but the bank kept calling us about loan interest and repeatedly asking us to continue their services.

Issues with Card Expiration and Cancellation:
Our Citibank card expired in September 2023 and could no longer be used. In October 2024, we called Citibank customer service at 6225 5225 to request the cancellation of the card. During the call, we updated them with our new address as we had moved to a new HDB. However, Citibank sent mail to the wrong address. We only discovered this error today, 8 December 2024, when we called customer service again.

Pressure to Reactivate the Card:
It appears their goal was to persuade us to activate the card to continue using it. After the credit card expired, we were unable to log in to the app, view statements, or make payments.

Unfair Late Payment Charges:
Despite being unable to access the app, we were charged an additional $100 for a late credit card payment. The inability to pay due to app inaccessibility added to our frustration.

Lack of Clear Communication:
Unlike other banks that email statements with attached PDFs, Citibank sent emails without statements. This left us unaware of the amount due, resulting in additional charges without our knowledge.
Pleasant space and level 7 feels like you’re in Gardens by the Bay’s flower dome. Good for meetings and having a relaxing cup of tea. They also serve mocktails at level 8.

Just let clients stand at the front desk while the staff processed tasks. We have to stand there the whole time while waiting for the staff. It’s not even a place for standing.

Saw several other clients’ personal IDs just lay in front of us on the edge of the front desk without any protection of clients’ card or information. It’s quite an eye-opening experience actually.

The place is nice if you plan to chill out but not talk to your banker and get best banking service.

Coffee is not bad and the barista is more customer-centric than the core banking service.

Citibank used to be top tier service. Now you’ll have to wait 30-45 minutes even if you booked an appointment with your RM. Not unless your purchasing funds then they will be on time.

Citibank, what happened?

Love the coffee and choc.  Though, am not banking with Lavazza.

No need to post nice pics about the place, other reviewers have already done a great job at it.

Continue the Citi credit card at your own risk!
